org.glassfish.jersey.media.sse
Support for Server Sent events in Jersey.

    EventSource

    Methods in org.glassfish.jersey.media.sse with parameters of type EventListener
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    EventSource.register(EventListener listener)
    Register new event listener to receive all streamed SSE events.
    void
    EventSource.register(EventListener listener, String eventName, String... eventNames)
    Add name-bound event listener which will be called only for incoming SSE events whose name is equal to the specified name(s).

    Description
    class 
    EventProcessor
    Private event processor task responsible for connecting to the SSE stream and processing incoming SSE events as well as handling any connection issues.

    Method parameters in org.glassfish.jersey.media.sse.internal with type arguments of type EventListener

    Method
    Description
    EventProcessor.Builder
    EventProcessor.Builder.boundListeners(Map<String,List<EventListener>> boundListeners)
    Unbounded listeners will get notified about incoming events with particular name.
    EventProcessor.Builder
    EventProcessor.Builder.unboundListeners(List<EventListener> unboundListeners)
